lead_paragraph: “Puro Deseo,” a new work by Luciana Achugar that seeks to weave magic in a dark, gothic way, began performances at the Kitchen on Thursday evening.
snippet: “Puro Deseo,” a new work by Luciana Achugar that seeks to weave magic in a dark, gothic way, began performances at the Kitchen on Thursday evening.

headline.main: Creeping in a Castle in the Dark
headline.seo: ‘Puro Deseo,’ With Luciana Achugar and Michael Mahalchick
headline.print_headline: Creeping in a Castle in the Dark
